mapper.insert: insert into booking (bookingNum, placenum, membernum, bookingstat, checkindate, checkoutdate, guestTotal) values('b'||BOOKING_SEQ.nextval,#{placeNum},#{memberNum}, 0,#{checkInDate},#{checkOutDate},#{guestTotal})
mapper.update: update booking set bookingstat=1, paytype = #{payType}, payinfo= #{payInfo}, paytotal= #{payTotal}, paydate=sysdate where bookingnum=#{bookingNum}
update booking set bookingstat=2 where checkoutDate <=sysdate
mapper.select: select * from booking where memberNum=#{memberNum} and bookingStat=1
select * from booking where memberNum=#{memberNum} and bookingStat=2
select name, email, phoneNum from member where memberNum = #{memberNum};
